com.github.shynixn.blockball.api.persistence.controller

Interface Controller<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ArenaController<Location,Arena>, BukkitArenaController, BukkitGameController, DatabaseController<T>, GameController<Location,Player,GameEntity,ArenaEntity>, LinkSignController<Location>, PlayerMetaController<PlayerMetaInfo,Player>, ReloadableController<T>, StatsController<Player>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArenaRepository, DatabaseRepository, GameRepository, NetworkSignRepository, PlayerInfoController, StatsRepository

    public Controller<T>

    Created by Shynixn 2018.
